snippet: Southeastern Asset Management, an investment firm that holds a 13.56 percent stake in Chesapeake, said, "We urge the board to be open to any offers to acquire the whole company."
abstract: Southeastern Asset Management, an investment firm that holds a 13.56 percent stake in Chesapeake, said, "We urge the board to be open to any offers to acquire the whole company."

headline.main: Shareholder Calls for Chesapeake to Be Open to Offers
